## bunny-cli upload-file

Upload a single file

### Synopsis

Upload a single file to Bunny.net.

```
bunny-cli upload-file [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string   Path to the file to upload (required)
  -h, --help          help for upload-file
```
